user_prompt: Create Epics and User Stories for the usecase

epics.title: Customer Authentication and Security
epics.summary: Implement secure multi-factor authentication and session management for portal access.
epics.description: Develop a robust authentication system leveraging multi-factor authentication (MFA) to ensure secure customer access. Implement secure session handling, password management, and login attempt monitoring. Integrate encryption protocols for data in transit and at rest. The system must comply with banking security standards and regulatory requirements to protect sensitive financial information from unauthorized access or breaches.

epics.title: Responsive User Interface and Dashboard
epics.summary: Design and build a responsive, user-friendly interface with a personalized dashboard.
epics.description: Create an intuitive and responsive front-end design compatible across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. The personalized dashboard must display customer-specific products and services, account summaries, and shortcuts for key actions. Ensure accessibility standards are met and the interface delivers consistent performance and usability across all supported platforms.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
epics.summary: Implement role-based access controls to manage customer data visibility.
epics.description: Develop and enforce role-based access controls to ensure customers can only view and perform actions permitted by their authorization level. Support dynamic role definitions tied to customer profiles and implement secure authorization checks across all portal modules. Integrate audit logging to track access and manage compliance with internal and regulatory policies.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Requests Workflow
epics.summary: Enable customers to submit account opening and service modification requests digitally.
epics.description: Build a workflow engine that allows customers to initiate, submit, and track requests for new account openings and service modifications through an intuitive, guided process. Minimize required clicks by providing smart forms, field validation, and pre-filled data where applicable. Enable real-time validation and routing logic to ensure efficient submission and processing of requests.

epics.title: Real-Time Status Tracking and Notifications
epics.summary: Provide real-time updates and email/SMS notifications for customer requests.
epics.description: Implement a communication and notification framework that informs customers of the status of their submitted requests in real-time. Integrate email and SMS notification services for key lifecycle events, from submission acknowledgment to completion. Present dynamic status updates within the dashboard to enhance transparency and user engagement.

epics.title: Application Draft Saving and Document Upload
epics.summary: Allow customers to save incomplete applications and upload required documents.
epics.description: Enable users to save partially completed forms or requests and return to them later without data loss. Develop secure document upload functionality supporting common file formats. Ensure uploaded files are encrypted, validated for security compliance, and accessible for processing through back-office workflows.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the self-service portal with existing core banking systems and data sources.
epics.description: Establish seamless integration between the self-service portal and the bank's core systems using secure APIs and message queues. Implement data synchronization to ensure updates reflect across systems in real-time. Design the integration layer to handle transaction reliability, fault tolerance, and version control, guaranteeing consistent customer data flow and high system uptime.

epics.title: Portal Data Management and Performance Optimization
epics.summary: Develop and maintain a dedicated database for the portal to optimize performance and reliability.
epics.description: Create a dedicated portal database designed for scalability and high availability. Maintain separate yet synchronized data stores to reduce dependencies on the core banking system for user interactions. Implement caching, indexing, and query optimization to achieve fast response times, and design backup/recovery strategies to ensure data integrity and minimal downtime.

epics.title: Activity History and Audit Logging
epics.summary: Maintain a comprehensive interaction history and full audit log.
epics.description: Implement a detailed logging mechanism to capture all user interactions, transactions, and workflow activities within the portal. Provide users access to their historical records for transparency and support internal investigations. Ensure audit logs are immutable, time-stamped, and meet security and compliance requirements for financial data management.

user_stories.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to use multi-factor authentication, so that my account access is secure.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The system should support SMS, email, and authenticator app-based MFA.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: MFA prompts should be triggered during login and session revalidation.
user_stories.test_cases: Given valid login credentials, When the user logs in, Then the system should prompt for a second authentication factor.

user_stories.title: Implement Secure Session Handling
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want my session to be securely managed, so that my activities remain private and secure.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Sessions should expire after a period of inactivity and require re-authentication.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Session timeout should occur after a configurable period of inactivity.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an active session, When the user is inactive for the timeout period, Then the user should be logged out of the portal.

user_stories.title: Implement Login Attempt Monitoring
user_stories.description: As a security administrator, I want login attempts to be monitored, so that I can protect against unauthorized access.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Monitor and log failed login attempts; lock accounts after a configurable number of failures.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Account should be locked after consecutive failed login attempts.
user_stories.test_cases: Given multiple failed login attempts, When the threshold is reached, Then the account should be locked and an alert generated.

user_stories.title: Design Responsive User Interface
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want a responsive user interface, so that I can access the portal on any device.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: UI must meet accessibility standards and be compatible with desktop, tablet, and mobile.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The portal UI should be accessible and functional on all supported devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given different devices, When accessing the portal, Then the UI should adapt to the screen resolution and orientation.

user_stories.title: Develop Personalized Dashboard
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can view my account information easily.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Dashboard should display customer-specific products, account summaries, and shortcuts.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The dashboard should dynamically display relevant customer information.
user_stories.test_cases: Given customer-specific data, When accessing the dashboard, Then personalized content should be displayed correctly.

user_stories.title: Implement Role-Based Access Controls
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to manage data visibility based on user roles, so that access is restricted appropriately.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Roles should be dynamically defined and tied to customer profiles.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users should only access data and actions permitted by their role.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user's role, When accessing the portal, Then the data and options should be restricted to role permissions.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Requests Workflow
user_stories.title: Enable Digital Account Opening
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to submit account opening requests online, so that the process is convenient.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The workflow should be intuitive with guided processes and validation.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Account opening forms should be easy to fill and validate data in real-time.
user_stories.test_cases: Given incomplete form data, When submitting the form, Then the system should prompt for any required missing fields.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Requests Workflow
user_stories.title: Develop Service Modification Requests
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to request service modifications online, so that I can easily manage my services.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Service modification requests should follow a guided, validated process.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Service modification forms should be user-friendly with real-time validation.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an initiated request, When modifying services, Then the system should provide step-by-step guidance and validations.

user_stories.title: Implement Real-Time Status Updates
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want real-time updates on my requests, so that I stay informed on their progress.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Real-time status updates should be integrated into the dashboard.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Customers should see real-time status updates for their requests in the dashboard.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a submitted request, When accessing the dashboard, Then the current status should be displayed in real-time.

user_stories.title: Integrate Email and SMS Notifications
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to receive email and SMS notifications for request status changes, so that I'm always updated.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Email and SMS notifications should be configured for key lifecycle events.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Customers should receive notifications via email and SMS for key status changes.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a submission event, When the request status changes, Then an email/SMS notification should be sent.

architecture_generation.description: This architecture ensures a secure, scalable, and user-friendly banking self-service portal, following best practices for security, performance, and maintainability. It encompasses services for frontend, backend, security, integration, business logic, notifications, logging, data protection, and CI/CD using Azure services.

architecture_validation.updatedDescription: The architecture diagram has been updated to address critical security and reliability issues by adding a Web Application Firewall (WAF) and disaster recovery components. All nodes and edges have been validated, and placeholders were added for missing references. The architecture now aligns more closely with the Azure Well-Architected Framework, achieving a high-quality rating for security, reliability, and performance.
